its broad disk just skirting the horizon, and diffusing a perpetual splendour. There—for with your leave, my sister, I will put some trust in preceding navigators—there snow and frost are banished; and, sailing over a calm sea, we may be wafted to a land surpassing in wonders <pb xml:id="F1818_v1_015" n="003"/>and in beauty every region hitherto discovered on the habitable globe.
